briefTitle: A Study Evaluating the Long-term Safety of VX-445 Combination Therapy
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-label Study Evaluating the Long-term Safety of VX-445 Combination Therapy in Subjects With Cystic Fibrosis
summary: This study evaluated the long-term safety and tolerability of elexacaftor (ELX), tezacaftor (TEZ), and ivacaftor (IVA) triple combination (TC) treatment in participants with cystic fibrosis (CF).

primaryOutcome.measure: Part A: Safety and Tolerability as Assessed by Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)

commonTop: Infective pulmonary exacerbation of cystic fibrosis
